Package pizza.message

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfirmationItem
    Represents one line item on an order confirmation, including a short description of the item, the quantity ordered, and its price.

    The representation of this object according to PizzaProtocol is

    Price:<itemPrice>, description:<itemDescription>
    -- all on a single line.
    ConfirmationItemTest
    Tests that a ConfirmationItem object correctly contains and returns data, and that its representation is correct
    ConfirmationMessage
    Itemized total bill for a pizza order, including a description and price of each item in the order plus sales tax and total.

    The representation of this object according to PizzaProtocol is

    4
    <Representation of first confirmation item>
    ...
    <Representation of last confirmation item>
    (Empty line)
    Sales tax: <sales tax amount>
    Order total amount: <total amount>
    END
    See documentation of ConfirmationItem for its representation.
    ConfirmationMessageTest
    Tests the ConfirmationMessag sent by a PizzaServer
    MenuItem
    Represents a menu item on a pizza restaurant menu.
    MenuMessage
    Represents a menu for a pizza restaurant.
    MenuMessageTest
    Test creating a menu and adding items and toppings
    MenuRequestMessage
    This Message type contains no data, but simply requests a message.
    MenuRequestMessageTest
    Verify encoding of MenuRequestMessage
    OrderItem
    Represents an item in a PizzaOrder sent from a PizzaClient to a PizzaServer.
    OrderMessage
    Represents a pizza order transmitted from a PizzaClient to a PizzaServer, containing one or more specialty pies and slices with toppings.

    The representation of this object according to PizzaProtocol is

    3 <Representation of first order item>
    ...
    <Representation of last order item>
    END

    See documentation of MenuItem and Topping classes for their representations.
    PizzaMessage
    Base class for all of the message types exchanged during operations of the Pizza Protocol.
    PizzaMessageTest
    Test for the ability to reconstitute an array of Strings into an object of a PizzaMessage subclas
    SliceMenuItem
    Represents a slice on a pizza menu.
    SliceMenuItemTest
    Verifies the data items and external representation of SliceMenuItem objects.
    SliceOrderItem
    Represents a slice together with zero or more toppings.
    SliceOrderItemTest  
    SpecialtyPizzaMenuItem
    Represents a specialty pizza item on a restaurant menu.

    The representation of this object according to PizzaProtocol is

    Item type:specialty pie, Menu id:<menu id>, small:<smallPrice>, medium:<mediumPrice>, large:<largePrice>, description:<description>

    -- all on a single line.
    SpecialtyPizzaMenuItemTest
    Verifies the data values and encoding of a specialty pizza menu item
    SpecialtyPizzaOrderItem
    Represents an order item for one or more specialty pizzas of a specified size SMALL, MEDIUM, or LARGE.

    The representation of this object according to PizzaProtocol is

    Item type:specialty pie, Menu id:<menu id>, size:<size>, quantity:<quantity>
    --all on a single line
    Where size is 1 (SMALL), 2 (MEDIUM), or 3 (LARGE)
    Topping
    Represents a topping that can be ordered for a pizza slice.
    ToppingTest
    Verify data content and encoding of slice toppings
